titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat certain payments made to the European Union in lieu of income taxes to a member of the European Union as income taxes paid to a foreign country for purposes of the foreign tax credit.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1931)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
9/19/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow taxpayers a foreign tax credit for employment taxes paid to the European Union.
